reviews.comment: yeah sex is cool, but have you ever player lego star wars skywalker saga?
i imagine sex is like this game
Got this game only to kill the younglings
It feels like the game is rushing you through the story. It skips quite a bit, especially in the prequels.Overall it's an enjoyable game for what it is.

reviews.username: Three Smol Johns in a Trenchcoat

reviews.comment: While there are parts that were handled better in the complete saga, this game really does present a step forward from other modern lego titles. I remember Lego Batman 3 where every quest was a meaningless fetch quest where Lego Kevin Smith would ask you to go pick up some dumb collectible. Lego Skywalker Saga has varied quests, fun openworld puzzles, and a very good use of cutscenes, meme lines, and other well timed gags that make reliving the star wars stories again still fun. Some reveiwers are saying the finished the game in 20 hours, but I have been finishing most puzzles on the way, and even in over 24 hours I have really only made it through the first 3 episodes.
I finished 1/3 of the game in 2 hours. Its fun but the Story is just... speed up. Even the original Lego Star Wars games had more content, and they were on a Wii.
